---
title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---
```{r}
library('DEoptimR')


Bent_Cigar= function(x)
  {
  Num=length(x)
	soma=0

	for (i in 1:Num)
	  {
		soma=soma+x[i]**2
		}
	fun=soma*1e6+x[1]**2
  return(fun)
  }
# f(x)=0 , x=(0,0,...,0) [-100,100]


dim=10
RUNS=50
ITE=1500
Y=0;X=0

for(i in 1:RUNS)
  {
  JDE_R=JDEoptim(rep(-100, dim), rep(100, dim), Bent_Cigar,
         tol = 1e-20,NP=100, trace = FALSE,  maxiter =ITE)
  Y[i]=JDE_R$value

  }



MEAN=mean(Y)
STD=sd(Y)
MAX=max(Y)
MIN=min(Y)
cat('Ackley JDE DIM=',dim,'RUNS=',RUNS,'ITE=',ITE,'\n')
cat('MEAN=',MEAN,'\n')
cat('MAX',MAX,'\n')
cat('MIN=',MIN,'\n')
cat('STD',STD,'\n')


```
